name: Oblivio
description:
Game done for the 8 bits to infinity's puzzle game jam, 

Theme  SLIDE.

We are a small team of 4 people, 3 Artists, and 1 Programmer, this is our  third jam game, hope you like it!!

Oblivio tells a story of a god trying to return to his throne, but on his way, there are a series of puzzles trying to keep him away from it.

GAMEPLAY

Solve the puzzle by moving by breaking and going back in time. Your goal is to get to the throne by solving all the levels

CONTROLS

WASD- To move

E- to turn back in time 

Right mouse button - to Break/Rebuild

Left mouse button - to pick up object/rotate

CREDITS

The assets are completely created by us in these 5 days except for the music and the sounds that are bought assets from the Marketplace and Unity AssetStore and the animations by MIXAMO.

 Developed by VOXEL: Marco Amabili, Matteo Maravalle and Daniele Amabili Matteusz Uznanski
